LanguageData.OE_ElderPower_Direwolf.label: elder direwolf power
LanguageData.OE_ElderPower_Direwolf.description: Unleash the power of the elder direwolf, empowering your strikes and lending supernatural speed to your movements.
LanguageData.OE_ElderPower_Raptor.label: elder raptor power
LanguageData.OE_ElderPower_Raptor.description: Unleash the power of the elder raptor, gaining deadly precision, blinding speed, and brutal efficiency in close combat.
LanguageData.OE_ElderPower_Ogren.label: elder ogren power
LanguageData.OE_ElderPower_Ogren.description: Unleash the power of the elder ogren, empowering each blow and hardening flesh like stone.
LanguageData.OE_ElderPower_Tionant.label: elder tionant power
LanguageData.OE_ElderPower_Tionant.description: Unleash the power of the elder tionant, amplifying your strength and accelerating the mending of wounds.
LanguageData.OE_ElderProvoke.label: elder provoke
LanguageData.OE_ElderProvoke.description: A thunderous roar compels nearby creatures to turn their focus toward the source, drawn by an overwhelming, primal force.
LanguageData.OE_ElderJump.label: elder jump
